meanings.sent1: The santalic aroma filled the room, creating a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume had a santalic scent that reminded me of a peaceful forest.
meanings.sent3: The santalic incense was so strong that it made everyone sneeze!
meanings.sent4: The santalic fragrance wrapped around me like a warm blanket, comforting and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The santalic wood had a unique smell that lingered in the air long after it was gone.

meanings.sent3: Her santalic perfume was so strong that it attracted bees!
